data.name: Succulent (Backpack Charm)
data.description: Complete the quest The Root Of The Matter to get this charm.

data.name: Surge Shield Recharger
data.description: A handkeld kit that recharges a shield

data.name: Surveyor Vault
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

guide_links.label: Where to Find Surveyor Vaults in ARC Raiders

data.name: Synthesized Fuel
data.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

data.name: Syringe
data.description: A sterile syringe for medical use. Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into plastic.

data.name: Tactical Mk. 1
data.description: Basic tactical augment. More Quick Use slots for more tactical choice, but limited survivability and slightly lower looting potential.

data.name: Tactical Mk. 2
data.description: Adds more backpack space and an extra utility item slot.
data.flavor_text: Upon Shield break, deploys a small smoke grenade. Has a fixed cooldown.

data.name: Tactical Mk.3 (Defensive)
data.description: A defence-focused augment for keeping shields topped up.
data.flavor_text: Allows Shield Rechargers to be used while running.

data.name: Tactical MK.3 (Defensive) Blueprint
data.description: a defense-focused augment for keeping Shields topped up

data.name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Healing)
data.description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.
data.flavor_text: When revived from being downed, releases a healing cloud that restores 20 health over 10 seconds. Has a 30-second cooldown.

data.name: Tactical MK.3 (Healing) Blueprint
data.description: A healing-focused augment which adds extra slots for healing items.

data.name: Tactical MK. 3 (Revival)
data.description: A tactical augment focused on utility over defense and looting.
data.flavor_text: Restores 1 health every 5 seconds. When damage is taken, the effect is paused for 30 seconds.

data.name: Tactical Mk. 3 (Revival) Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft Tactical MK. 3 (Revival) Blueprint.

data.name: Tagging Grenade
data.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, tagging Raiders and ARC enemies in an area, allowing you to briefly track their location.

data.name: Tagging Grenade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Tagging Grenade

data.name: Tangerine (Warden Color)
data.description: A new cosmetic variant will be added to your collection.

data.name: Tattered ARC Lining
data.description: Obtained from ARC enemies or activities. Can be recycled into fabric.

data.name: Tattered Clothes
data.description: Can be recycled into fabric.

data.name: Telemetry Transceiver
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.name: Tempest Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Tempest

data.name: Tempest I
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle with moderate fire rate and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Tempest II
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle with moderate fire rate and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Tempest III
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle with moderate fire rate and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Tempest IV
data.description: Fully automatic assault rifle with moderate fire rate and accuracy.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Thermostat
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Tick Pod
data.description: The explosive pod from a Tick. Can be recycled into ARC Alloy.

data.name: Toaster
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Torch Ginger
data.description: A plant used to craft medical supplies.

data.name: Torn Blanket
data.description: A tattered piece of cloth.

data.name: Torn Book
data.description: What pages remain speak of chosen heroes, vampires, and lots of longing glances.

data.name: Torrente Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Torrente

data.name: Torrente I
data.description: Has large ammo capacity, but is only accurate while crouched.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Torrente II
data.description: Has large ammo capacity, but is only accurate while crouched.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Torrente III
data.description: Has large ammo capacity, but is only accurate while crouched.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Torrente IV
data.description: Has large ammo capacity, but is only accurate while crouched.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Trailblazer Grenade
data.description: A grenade that emits a trail of flammable gas along its path, causing an explosive chain reaction when it ignites.

data.name: Trailblazer Grenade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Trailblazer Grenade

data.name: Trigger Nade
data.description: A remote-detonated grenade that can stick to surfaces and ARC, dealing explosive damage when triggered.

data.name: Trigger Nade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Trigger Nade

data.name: Tropical Duck
data.description: It quietly dreams of taking to the skies with its brethren.
data.flavor_text: Can be thrown to create noise

data.name: Turbo Pump
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Unusable Weapon
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Vase
data.description: A decorative vase, possibly valuable.

data.name: Venator Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Venator. Fires two shots at a time.

data.name: Venator I
data.description: Semi-automatic pistol. Fires two shots at a time.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Venator II
data.description: Semi-automatic pistol. Fires two shots at a time.
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Venator III
data.description: Semi-automatic pistol. Fires two shots at a time
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Venator IV
data.description: Semi-automatic pistol. Fires two shots at a time
data.flavor_text: Somewhat effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Vertical Grip I
data.description: Slightly reduces vertical recoil.

data.name: Vertical Grip II
data.description: Moderately reduces vertical recoil.
